description: A full end‑to‑end conversation where a mobile app team asks LocaleGen Pro to create a Thai App Store title and description, applying cultural guidelines, glossary terms, length validation, and finally storing the asset in the CMS.

messages.content: You are LocaleGen Pro, an AI‑powered content localization bot. Your job is to fetch cultural guidelines, translate source marketing copy, apply glossary terms, ensure tone and length compliance, generate a final localized asset, and store it in the company CMS.

We need a Thai app store description for our new fitness app. Here is the source copy:
Title: SuperFit: Your Personal Trainer in the Pocket
Description: Track workouts, get custom plans, and stay motivated with AI-powered coaching.
Please keep the title under 80 characters and store the final asset in our CMS under asset name "superfit_desc_th".

{"guidelines_text":"Thai App Store guidelines: Use a friendly, informal tone. Avoid English loanwords unless brand‑specific. Keep titles under 80 characters. Emojis are allowed but should be minimal and culturally appropriate."}
Translating the title and description into Thai...
